channel.title: Problem wid project czar non membership version
channel.description: hey ive downloaded project czar (the version wid no membership) but i still cant enter the non mem portal? how i make it so all can enter mem portal?

item.title: Problem wid project czar non membership version
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121
item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

watch boolean SaveChar()
Then search for

characterfile.write("character-ismember = ", 0, 21);

change it to…

characterfile.write("character-ismember = ", 1, 21);

Now the server saves ur character as a member.
Else…
Just find evry if(playerIsMember == 0)
and change it to if(playerIsMember == 1)

Greets,
KamerScape owner.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem wid project czar non membership version

item.title: Problem wid project czar non membership version
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Uh, either way all the things in the members area items wise are members only, so they’d need to be fixed, as far as monsters, it’s only barrow’s not including torag’s, and then you got the objects too train on… nothing more, just remove it tbh? [if you don’t want members].
